price: Atacan! Rəhmandan sənə bir əzab toxunub və beləcə, şeytana yoldaş olmandan qorxuram”.
arabic: يَٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٞ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيۡطَٰنِ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāabati innī akhāfu an yamassaka ʿadhābun mina al-raḥmāni fatakūna lilshayṭāni waliyyan
